website_summaries.verdict: A quality watch with a classic style that is durable enough to be worn on an every day basis, and stylish enough to wear for special occasions.
pros: Lightweight and comfortable watch design, perfect for everyday wear
Watch is constructed of high quality materials: golden tone stainless steel and 100% genuine leather
Hands and time tick marks are well defined
cons: Watch strap may be smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for this price.
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks nice but the quality is very cheap. It is out of alignment and for this kind of quality it is over priced. This is my first and last watch from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert Greene

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch. Exactly what my husband wanted. Unfortunately it does not function properly. It’ll tell time and then it’ll all of a sudden be an hour slow. We’ll reset it. It’ll work for a few days and then run slow again. We switched out the battery with no luck. Mvmt watches will not exchange it and I can’t get through to amazon. Total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark franz

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: The strap is not made out of leather. In addition, the watch itself yells low quality from miles away. As a watch fanatic, I attempted this new brand thinking it was an innovation but was surely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: yovanni

customer_reviews.title: MVMT 40 Series
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is my second review. My husband saw this watch advertised on TV and was impressed with the company and the fellas who started this very successful company. He got this watch as part of an early Christmas present when is 25year old Tissot bit the dust and was terribly expensive to rebuild. It came promptly and in excellent packaging. It looks great and fits well after adding a link at the local jewelry store. Clasp snaps shut and is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality.  The 5 star reviews are bought
customer_reviews.text: This watch is defective and after reading other reviews it's clear this is a company-wide problem, not a single watch. I also received this watch slightly used and worn in despite buying new. After only a day of use it started to slow down and die. I would reset the watch a few times and it eventually would stop completely. I put it aside and came back later to find it working again. I reset the watch and now it has completely died. DO NOT BUY THIS WATCH OR ANYTHING FROM THE COMPANY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging and quality for this price point
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect and being that I have already purchased MOVADO, BULOVA, CITIZENS etc... but was pleasantly surprised at the quality and. I am a big guy so the watch comes with a laughably small wrist band, but they do package it with extensions and I had to use all 4 that they provide.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box broke
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed upon initial receipt. Un boxing the watch (my first MVMT watch) and to my surprise upon going to set the time the winder-shaft simply dropped out of the watch. I had not even pulled the tags off. It seemed to snap back in, but now I dont trust its reliability. So, at this point Im working the standard Amazon return/exchange policy and hoping the replacement is not broken. Waste of my valuable time, in terms of setting up the return, returning the item (driving to drop off center), and waiting for the new one. But Im proceeding as this is hopefully an anomally. Will update this review upon successful completion of all transactions and actually using the watch.
customer_reviews.author: BentChainRIng

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality watch!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this watch to my husband on our wedding day. He's a big fan of watches, never is he without one. He absolutely loves this one! (I do too)! It's really great quality... especially for the price! When looking to purchase watches in the future, I will go to MVMT. I'll, no doubt, be a repeat customer. Thank you, Kelly Verbosky
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: DON'T TAKE MY MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Okay my first thought was how cheap the watch felt when I took it out of the fancy packaging. I'm disappointed to say the least. Unfortunately I would recommend you pass on this product and don't fall for the trap that is their marketing on social media etc. The price does not reflect the quality.
customer_reviews.author: cristian

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch for beginners or for situations where you might damage a more expensive one. Its chronometer isnt the best so you might end up having to double check that it has tracked time accurately if it is stored for long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Engle

customer_reviews.title: Its a beautiful watch if it fits.
customer_reviews.text: The strap was a little tight..tried to adjust it looked up videos would have been nice to have received with the box tools and instructions.....gave to my son for christmas...has not been able to wear it...
customer_reviews.author: T_Mart

customer_reviews.title: In the middle
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the watch and is beautiful, love the gold belt and simple face. Just what I wanted, nothing bulky and distracting. Had to resize, so I removed 1 link and is tight enough to leave imprint on my skin. With the 1 link unremoved it slides up and down all the time.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty "snapping"  band closure
customer_reviews.text: Good looking watch for the money. Unfortunately, the watch falls off sometimes because I can't properly snap the closure when wearing the watch. I'm contacting the company to see if they have a solution. If I get help, I'll update my assessment.
customer_reviews.author: Cordelia Becker

customer_reviews.title: It’s a bery beautiful watch but The band is way too small for ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my husband yesterday as a gift. It’s a bery beautiful watch but The band is way too small for any man at our party. We need to return this. How do we do that?
customer_reviews.author: Debra Drager

customer_reviews.title: Great Style and Value
customer_reviews.text: Great Style and Value... I looked at quite a few affordable watches for work and this one is perfect for me ... I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a Christmas present for my husband. He wore it New Year’s Eve with his suit. Love the face of this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Corson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap band
customer_reviews.text: The band is fading and cracking I just bought this for a gift in Dec My husband really likes it but is very unhappy about the band
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: A Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: A very nice watch! I’m not usually a watch-wearer, but it looks great, has a simple and clean design, and goes with pretty much any outfit. Maybe a bit pricey for some, but it’s well worth the price for a high-end watch.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Barker

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase (glass face scratch-able though)
customer_reviews.text: Bought a little over 3 months ago, slick looking watch and I've gotten compliments on it as well. The -1 star is for scratching after about 1-2 weeks after purchasing. Only I can see it but others would see it when inspecting from from >3 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Premo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome everyday watch
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style. It has clean lines. It's classic watch with a modern flare. Wear it daily or wear it with your suit. You can change the straps really easily and they are available on mvmt.com
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Ho

customer_reviews.title: Best Watch I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I wear it every day. Head size is perfect fit and the watch refuses to scratch. Best watch I ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.  Poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very poorly made. Opened it up and it was not ticking so I attempted to gently twist the winder and the whole winder stem slid out of the watch. The description says it is waterproof up to 3 meters but the next sentence states you should not submerge it under water. What?
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Lovely Watch bought for my father who doesn't care for name brands. Comfy and easy to adjust
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Caccamo

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend. He really likes it. Said he has gotten few compliments on it and it is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for boyfriend/hubby
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful and my boyfriend loves it and wears it every day! The quality is amazing and the color is very cool.
customer_reviews.author: ERIN M

customer_reviews.title: So Fancy!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised my boyfriend with this beautiful watch for Valentines Day and he LOVED it! Only small issue was the band was a little tight. Hopefully the leather will stretch a bit and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I gave the watch to my brother and he was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A Feeney

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, nice feel
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't happy that the post popped out while I was trying to get the watch set up, but it popped back into place and the watch has been operating fine. It's a very light watch, and has a great minimalist design. I was surprised that it doesn't have a date function, but I can overlook that detail. I'll consider MVMT for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Hard to see the time
customer_reviews.text: The style and look of the watch are great. However, as with other reviewers of this watch, it is pretty hard to see the time if you're not in range of a good light source. If you're trying to see the dials of the watch at night, forget it.
customer_reviews.author: aM

customer_reviews.title: Small watch face
customer_reviews.text: The face of the watch is smaller than expected. It was given to my husband for Xmas. I ended up wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C. McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend as a gift and he absolutely loved it. The color is so perfect it can be worn with literally anything! He really liked being able to add chain links to make it a little bigger. Forever will love everything from MVMT
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Patiently Waiting
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch, so far holds time well an looks great Only problem is .my Husband has a large wrist so the 4 additional links that was sent barley fit his arm an he hasn't been able to wear it. I have emailed the company and ask for additional ones so he can wear it an so far I have heard from no one. Patiently waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it cost way more than it did, I’ll definitely be adding more to my collection
customer_reviews.author: Ron Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice styling and fit
customer_reviews.text: Came with extra links if you need them but my son’s wrist is slim and it fit well. Made for a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: 10 Outta 10
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves watches, and this one has become his favorite. Not only is it a great looking watch, but he loves the slim design, which makes it very comfortable to wear. It made a really nice gift. I’m pleased and so is he.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Leather strap is horrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the band is horrible. I bought this yesterday, as soon as I put it on my wrist, it created about an inch of markings (wear) on the inferior side. The color of the leather faded on first use. I can’t see this band lasting more than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: j.p.

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch came so sleek and clean. The colors black and red worked so well with each other. The links were very easy to customize as well. Gifted to my boyfriend for Christmas and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars but clasp sucks, it’s flimsy and can be an inconvenience but overall I’m very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Trevan troxwell

customer_reviews.title: Easily adjusted by jeweler.
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek! My husband likes the way it sits on his wrist. Not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: this was such a great gift if your looking for something to buy him
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek, very light attractive watch. My husband wears it everyday and gets a ton of compliments, this was such a great gift if your looking for something to buy him.
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Boles

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it looks !!! It comes with extra links and they were a bit challenging to add but overall, love the wstch!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Zullo

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch for $$
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Love the clasp and how it is easily adjustable. I wanted something just plain and simple yet stylish and that’s what I got
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The watch was purchased for an anniversary gift. Very sleek and casual for everyday. The black face with light tan band looks GREAT. BUT, for a 6’2 man the mm size of the watch face is too small. My fault.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Never heard of this brand, but I bought it as a gift for my boyfriend. He really likes it, but the battery died like 4 or 5 days after receiving it. Over all very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first but band fell apart within 6 months. One of the number marks also fell off. Very disappointed in this watch for the money i paid!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch, easy to adjust. Very sleek and comfortable. Will definitely be looking forward to the same watch but with red instead of rose gold. Hope you can make this happen MVMT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the man in your life!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend and he loved it! The packaging was sleek, and we had no issues with the watch. It was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Andi Fredricks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch, I’ll be buying MVMT again soon
customer_reviews.author: Hernan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift, came in a great little package no problems or issues and the recipient who doesn’t usually wear watches now finds reasons to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery died
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product but the battery died a year later...
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: A very beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a relatively inexpensive compared to other watches, it's beautiful and it's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my Son. He loves it! It was packaged nicely as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Make a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Thin and light, stylish yet comfortable. Not too fancy, so it made a perfect gift for my boyfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Kalene Eck

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, sharp watch
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch for my boyfriend. He absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a fashionable watch
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful, understated watch that looks good with a suit as much as it does with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: LRL

customer_reviews.title: accurate,easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. Leather band will be replaced with a stretch band
customer_reviews.author: JACK GIZDICH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Do you have one similar to this that has the date on it?
customer_reviews.author: sheila ray

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend , very sleek and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Newman

customer_reviews.title: Need a watch for your man?
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my boyfriend for his birthday and he loves it; the only time he doesn’t wear it is when he’s at the gym!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is smart (price wise) and sophisticated. I’ve gotten many compliments
customer_reviews.author: joey boncore

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husbands christmas gift and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My son was thrilled with this gift for his college graduation
customer_reviews.author: MaryBeth Dunn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Watch band too small can’t fit on a mans rist
customer_reviews.author: Robert Giard

customer_reviews.title: Bought after hearing the recommendation from Ben Shapiro
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, great price. My husband is very happy with it and I think it looks great on him
customer_reviews.author: Rae

product_meta.title: MVMT 40 Series Watches | 40 MM Men's Analog Watch
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :6.85 x 3.62 x 1.73 inches; 9.52 Ounces
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required.
 * Date First Available :May 15, 2018
 * Manufacturer :MVMT
 * ASIN :B01HRVPMHK

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #177,364 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #1182 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #674 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #47683 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars230 ratings
feature_bullets: MVMT 40 series analog watches feature a slightly slimmer 40 MM diameter case size for a more sophisticated feel; with a case depth of approximately 7MM, this watch lays flat against the wrist

This men's watch features a case made of brushed rose gold stainless steel; rose gold hands and markers and a red second hand stand out vividly against the white dial; the strap is made of 100% genuine brown leather, and it's easily interchangeable
The 40 series offers battery-powered 3-hand Miyota Quartz movement

MVMT 40 series is the perfect combination of tough and stylish; the glass is made of hardened mineral quartz for enhanced durability, and the watch is weatherproof up to 3 ATM/30 Meters; this makes it perfect for carefree everyday use, but it should not be submerged in water
Designed at our headquarters in Los Angeles, CA; we're confident you'll love our watches, so we offer a two-year guarantee for everything we make
